articles.title: Second-day Meeting of First Conference of Chairpersons of Primary Committees of WPK Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Second-day Meeting of First Conference of Chairpersons of Primary Committees of WPK Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- There took place the second-day meeting of the First Conference of Chairpersons of the Primary Committees of the Workers' Party of Korea on Saturday.
					 The meeting continued under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Chairpersons of primary party committees of units at various levels made speeches on the precious successes, experience and lessons drawn in the party work of their units.
					
					 Speakers analyzed and reviewed the successes and experience gained in consolidating the primary party committees, the basic organizations of the Party, as strong militant ranks equipped with the firm faith and indomitable offensive-oriented spirit of devotedly defending the leader and implementing the Party's policies to the letter and the revolutionary outposts adjoining the yard of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 They said that the primary party organizations aroused the masses to the heroic struggle to create the new Korean speed, the Mallima speed, regarding the implementation of the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the key point of the party work and enhancing the vanguard role of the party members in the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 They pointed out that they have firmly consolidated the primary party organizations of their units as loyal militant ranks armed with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and implementing the Party's policies to the letter with transparent revolutionary outlook on the leader.
					
					 They recalled that they have led the producer masses through practical examples, providing on-site guidance and dynamically conducting  on-site political work as frontline-style one the way the commanding officers of the People's Army do and thus performed new miracles and feats in the general offensive.
					
					 Hearing the speeches, the participants of the conference once again deeply grasped the real meaning of the instructions of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un that the examples set by officials are more powerful political work than hundreds of words and that it is necessary to convert the Party work into the on-site political work and work to motivate people.
					
					 At the conference an in-depth analysis was made of deviations and shortcomings manifested at some units at present where the work of primary party committees failed to reflect the Party's intention and meet the requirements of the developing revolution, and strong criticism was made of them. The conference discussed ways to draw lessons from the shortcomings and thoroughly rectify them.
					
					 Criticism was also made of officials for their shortcomings reflected in perfunctorily implementing the Party's decision, not giving priority to the work for firmly arming themselves with the Party's line and policies.
					
					 There was criticism of failing to conduct the drive for implementing the Party's line and policies in a do-or-die spirit and of failing to meticulously organize the party life among officials and other party members and guide it to suit the characteristic features of relevant units.
					
					 In the light of self-criticisms and criticisms measures were taken to firmly build up the primary committees of the whole party into the militant units with strong organizational and executive capabilities and bring about a revolutionary turn in the ideological viewpoint and work traits and style of the chairpersons of the primary party committees.
					
					 Speakers evinced their resolutions to firmly consolidate the primary party organizations as outposts for devotedly defending the leader and carrying out the Party's policies to the letter by creditably fulfilling their responsibility and role as direct organizers, information officials and implementers in executing the Party's policies.
					
					 The conference goes on.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Denounced for Anti-Chongryon Racket
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Denounced for Anti-Chongryon Racket
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea Sunday made public a statement in denunciation of the Japanese reactionaries' political suppression of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan.
					 In the early morning of Dec. 19, the Japanese authorities let gangs of the police joint investigation team in Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures forcefully search private houses of Chongryon officials and compatriots and offices of companies run by them under the pretence of violation of the "law on foreign exchange".
					
					 They abruptly thronged into the house of the chairman of the Shibuse, Tokyo Metropolis, branch of Chongryon, inquiring if he had something to do with its Central Standing Committee. When they failed to find any evidence, they took away documents on the company's business for no ground.
					
					 Timing to coincide with this attack, another gangs of the police joint investigation team searched the homes of the chairman and the director of international department of the Football Association of Koreans in Japan and their company for two days, forcefully linking them to the Japanese company "Emu Create's" violation of the "law on foreign exchange".
					
					 The statement branded their searches as one more grave provocation to Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan and an intolerable challenge and hideous crime against the DPRK and Chongryon.
					
					The recent searches by the Japanese reactionaries are aimed to damage the international prestige of the DPRK and Chongryon by labeling Chongryon an organization engaged in illegal activities, and further incite the anti-DPRK and anti-Chongryon climate all over Japan in order to invent a pretext for checking the just action of Chongryon and Japan-resident Koreans and kicking off a wholesale crackdown on Chongryon, the statement pointed out, saying:
					
					 Chongryon is a precious part of the DPRK; Koreans in Japan are the flesh and blood of our country and people.
					
					 It is the consistent stand and fixed will of the DPRK to decisively react to any slight persecution or suppression of Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan, regarding it as a blatant encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese authorities' desperate efforts to repress Chongryon, a dignified overseas citizens organization of Juche Korea, despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, will fan up its army and people's hostility toward Japan, and Japan will have to bear full responsibility for all the consequences.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 90th Anniversary of Anti-Japanese Women's Association
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 90th Anniversary of Anti-Japanese Women's Association
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Hall of Women on Sunday to mark the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Anti-Japanese Women's Association.
					 President Kim Il Sung made sure that the Association, a Juche-based women's mass organization, was formed on December 26, Juche 15 (1926), helping the revolutionary activities of Mother Kang Pan Sok.
					
					 The Association was a new revolutionary women's organization true to Kim Il Sung's idea and leadership with the Juche idea as its guidelines. It was a powerful mass organization of women struggling to down with the Japanese imperialists and achieve the independence of Korea and the social and political emancipation of women.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, officials concerned and women's union officials and members.
					
					 Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the women's union, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that the formation of the Anti-Japanese Women's Association was a solemn declaration that the Korean women's movement entered a new stage of development victoriously advancing under the guidance of Kim Il Sung and a historic event of weighty significance in the development of the women's movement and their socio-political life.
					
					 After the formation of the Association, Kim Il Sung had wisely led the work for expanding and strengthening it, the reporter noted, adding:
					
					 The President founded the Democratic Women's Union of North Korea, which inherited the tradition of the Association, after the liberation of the country and guided the Korean women to powerfully push one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot with their united efforts.
					
					 The glorious history of the Juche-oriented Korean women's movement is associated with the noble devotion of Kang Pan Sok, the outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement, and Kim Jong Suk, the anti-Japanese war heroine.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed the Korean women's movement into higher level, firmly preserving and glorifying the President's idea on the women's movement and his leadership exploits.
					
					 The great leaders' politics of attaching importance to the women and respecting them is now creditably carried forward under the wise guidance of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need for all the Korean women and members of the women's union to add brilliance to the tradition and history of the Juche-based Korean women's movement under the banner of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and fully discharge their responsibility and duty in the struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Osandok Prize Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Osandok Prize Sports Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Osandok Prize Sports Contest came to a close with due ceremony at the Ice Rink here on Sunday.
					 The Taesongsan Sports Team placed first in the team standings.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Moral Sense of Obligation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Un's Revolutionary Moral Sense of Obligation
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says that leader Kim Jong Il is the peerlessly great man who set it as an important issue related to the destiny of the revolution and socialism to respect the revolutionary forerunners and created a shining example of the revolutionary moral obligation. 
					 Noting that the great tradition of the revolutionary moral obligation is being steadily carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the article goes on:
					
					 The greatness of leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is ushering in a new chapter of the revolutionary moral obligation, is that he made sure that steady continuity is given to the history of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He adopted it as his lifelong mission to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and adhere to their ideas and feats and successfully carry them forward.
					
					 His greatness is found in the fact that he saw to it that the revolutionary forerunners boundlessly faithful to the party and the leader are respected and the precious traditions they established are carried forward forever.
					
					 He made sure that the army and people of the DPRK deeply respect the revolutionary forerunners and consider it as peculiar traits and tradition to firmly protect the revolutionary gains they won at the cost of blood.
					
					 With the warmest revolutionary comradeship and genuine obligation, Kim Jong Un has cemented the single-minded unity of the revolutionary ranks of the DPRK and fully demonstrated its might in the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 It is his noble stand on the people to uphold the people of the DPRK, as he does the great leaders, always cherishing the images of the great leaders who believed in the people as in Heaven.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Intention to Hasten THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Intention to Hasten THAAD Deployment 
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The puppet Defense Ministry of south Korea asserted that electricity, water supply, road and other basic facilities are already in place in the region where THAAD is to be deployed and therefore it won't take much time to build new facilities, adding the THAAD deployment can be completed by May next year.
					 Brooks, commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea, also bluffed that THAAD would be deployed in south Korea within some months.
					
					 Originally, the THAAD deployment in south Korea was scheduled to be done by the end of 2017. Now the U.S. plans to do it 7 months earlier than the original schedule.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The motion calling for impeachment of Park Geun Hye which was passed through the "National Assembly" on Dec. 9 will be finalized at the "Constitution Court" within six months. Therefore, the U.S. and the puppet military are busying themselves to complete the THAAD deployment in south Korea before that.
					
					 The ruin of the Park group of traitors serving the U.S. as its faithful stooge is a thing not desired by the U.S. making desperate efforts to turn south Korea into its eternal colony and an advanced nuclear base for deterring big powers in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 No one can vouch when the south Korean people's wrath against the Park regime will turn into the anti-U.S. struggle.
					
					 That is why the U.S. is working hard to deploy THAAD at any cost in the period when the Park group still stays in office. And the Park group is seeking to maintain its dirty political remaining days by clinging to the coattails of its master.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Puppet PM for Enforcing Policy for Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts S. Korean Puppet PM for Enforcing Policy for Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Hwang Kyo An, puppet prime minister of south Korea, recently declared through media that he would not modify the "main foreign polices" of traitor Park Geun Hye such as the deployment of THAAD and the "agreement on the issue of comfort women" with Japan.
					 He went the great lengths of blustering that it means that the "existing policies" remain unchanged.
					
					 In this regard, Minju Joson Sunday comments that the "existing polices," with which the puppet group of traitors are determined to press ahead, mean the policy for the confrontation with the DPRK and the sycophantic and traitorous one.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The deployment of THAAD, the "agreement on the issue of comfort women" with Japan, the agreement on protecting military intelligence, etc. were reached pursuant to the U.S. strategy for dominating Asia as they are product of the traitorous policy enforced by Park Geun Hye to do harm to the fellow countrymen in the north at any cost in collusion with the aggressive outsider.
					
					 The public mindset is sure to mete out punishment to those hell-bent on enforcing those policies.
					
					 A striking proof of it is that the south Korean people from all walks of life are strongly demanding the removal of Hwang at once as he is making desperate efforts to enforce those frantic polices. 
					
					 Whoever runs counter to the aspiration and desire of the fellow countrymen in conspiracy with the aggression-minded foreign forces is doomed only to come to a miserable end.

articles.title: 9th All-People Action Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
9th All-People Action Launched in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The 9th all-people action for resignation of Park Geun Hye was reportedly launched across south Korea on Saturday.
					 Taking part in the action, sponsored by the People's Emergency Action for Resignation of the Park Geun Hye Regime, were 702,000 people from all walks of life in Seoul, Pusan, Kwangju, Taegu and all other parts of south Korea.
					
					 A rally took place at the Kwanghwamun plaza in the wake of various struggles in more than 20 places of Seoul.
					
					 In Pusan, 70,000 citizens held a rally in demand of the prompt ouster and detention of Park Geun Hye, the early decision on the motion calling for her impeachment and the total resignation of Hwang Kyo An's Cabinet.
					
					 More than 10,000 citizens took a candlelight rally in Kwangju.
					
					 Inhabitants in 17 areas of South Jolla Province launched candlelight actions, strongly urging the resignation of Park Geun Hye and disbandment of the ruling "Saenuri Party".
					
					 Similar actions took place in North Kyongsang, North and South Chungchong provinces and all other parts of south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Urges Hwang Kyo An's Cabinet to Immediately Resign
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Urges Hwang Kyo An's Cabinet to Immediately Resign
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo carried an editorial on Dec. 22, urging the Cabinet of Hwang Kyo An to immediately resign.
					 The editorial pointed out that Park Geun Hye's policies against labor, democracy, people's living and peace such as retrogressive revision of labor law, "state-compiled" history textbook and deployment of THAAD are being pursued by Hwang's Cabinet.
					
					 It claimed that the slogan put up by the Confederation of Trade Unions in its struggle against Hwang's Cabinet is the just one reflecting the mind of the candlelight holders.
					
					 It stressed that the present situation proves that Park Geun Hye administers the "state affairs" from behind the veil by using her robot Hwang Kyo An.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Angola
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Angola
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was aired by an Angolan press on Dec. 15 on the occasion of the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life dedicated to the country and the people.
					
					 It also clarifies the important matters in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in France
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Front of France brought out leader Kim Jong Il's work "National Reunification Must Be Realized Independently by the Concerted Efforts of Our Nation Itself" in pamphlet at the Democrate Publishing House on Dec. 14, three days ahead of the 5th anniversary of his demise.
					 The work, published on June 30, Juche 89 (2000), says that Korea's reunification is the internal matter and the supreme task of the nation and deals with the idea that Korea should be reunified by the efforts of the Korean nation responsible for it.

articles.title: Personages of Different Countries Visit DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Personages of Different Countries Visit DPRK Missions
Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Delegations of political parties, governments, social organizations and personages in different countries visited DPRK missions abroad in the period from Dec. 14 to 17 to commemorate the 5th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They placed floral baskets and bunches of flowers at the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their pictures and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The visitors included the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, a delegation of the Ministry for the Royal Palace of Cambodia, the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, the director of the International Affairs Department of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia, the director of the Political Bureau of the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba and his party, the honorary chairman of the international preparatory committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu who is former prime minister of the Nepalese government, the vice-director for Foreign Relations of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola, a member of the Secretariat of the National Committee of the Workers' World Party of the United States of America and the secretary general of the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Revolutionary Career Praised by Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Revolutionary Career Praised by Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Dec. 15 made public a joint statement to mark the 99th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, the anti-Japanese war heroine.
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Suk joined the Korean People's Revolutionary Army founded by President Kim Il Sung and had fought heroically, adding:
					
					 She brought up leader Kim Jong Il as the great successor to the cause of the Juche revolution, the cause of Songun revolution, and this is the greatest of her exploits.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea, she proactively assisted Generalissimo Kim Il Sung in wisely leading the building of a new country.
					
					 She also made titanic contributions to the development of the Korean women's movement.
					
					 Her revolutionary career is a great example to be followed by all revolutionaries and anti-imperialist fighters of the world.
					
					 Even though her life was short, it was a glorious and brilliant life.
					
					 She will be always alive in our hearts.

articles.title: Concluye la segunda jornada de Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido
articles.content:
Concluye la segunda jornada de Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 24 la sesion de la segunda jornada de la Primera Conferencia de los Presidentes de Comite de Base del Partido.
					El conclave prosiguio bajo la direccion del Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un. 
					
					En la reunion, los presidentes de los comites de base del partido a todos los niveles continuaron sus intervenciones sobre los valiosos exitos, experiencias y lecciones adquiridos en las labores partidistas de sus unidades. 
					
					Los intervencionistas analizaron y balancearon los exitos y experiencias logrados en consolidar los comites de base, organizaciones primarias del partido, como poderosas filas penetradas de la invariable conviccion e indoblegable espiritu de ataque para defender a ultranza al lider y materializar a riesgo de vida las politicas del partido y como bases avanzadas de la revolucion, colindadas con el patio del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					Mencionaron que tomando como quehacer principal de la labor partidista la materializacion de los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los comites de base del partido movilizaron a las masas a la lucha heroica por crear la nueva velocidad de Corea, la de Mallima, al elevar el papel vanguardista de los militantes del partido en la construccion de potencia socialista.
					
					Se refirieron a que con la firme concepcion revolucionaria del lider, convirtieron los comites de base del partido de las respectivas unidades en las filas de fidelidad, colmadas de la determinacion de defender a ultranza al lider y materializar a riesgo de vida las politicas del partido.
					
					Continuaron que han creado nuevos milagros y meritos en la ofensiva general al realizar intensamente en el terreno la direccion y las labores politicas siendo funcionarios del tipo de campana al igual que los comandantes del Ejercito Popular y conducir con acciones ejemplares a las masas productoras.
					
					Escuchando esos discursos, los participantes volvieron a comprender la veracidad de las instrucciones del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un de que la conducta ejemplar de los funcionarios es la labor politica mas eficiente que las palabras profusas y las labores partidistas deben convertirse en las politicas en el terreno para ganarse el alma de las personas.
					
					En la conferencia se analizaron con profundidad las desviaciones y faltas observadas en la actualidad en algunas unidades donde las labores del comite de base del partido no corresponden al proposito del partido y a la demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo.
					
					Hubo las criticas mordaces y se debatieron los remedios para sacar lecciones de los errores y superarlos consecuentemente.
					
					Fueron criticados los errores de que los mismos funcionarios cumplen formalmente las decisiones del partido sin dar prioridad a la labor de armarse firmemente con la linea y politicas del partido.
					
					Durante las criticas, fue senalado que no se ha emprendido con la decision de vida o muerte la lucha por materializar la linea y orientaciones del partido y fueron abordados los problemas de no haber organizado ni dirigido con escrupulosidad la vida partidista de los funcionarios y militantes conforme a las caracteristicas de las respectivas entidades.
					
					Mediante las autocriticas y las criticas, fueron mencionadas las medidas para formar las organizaciones de base de todo el partido como unidades con fuerte capacidad organizativa y ejecutiva y producir un viraje revolucionario en el punto de vista ideologico y el modo de trabajo de los presidentes de comite de base.
					
					Los oradores tomaron la decision de cumplir con toda su responsabilidad y papel como organizadores, propagandistas y ejecutores directos de las politicas del partido para convertir las unidades encargadas en las bases avanzadas para la defensa a ultranza al lider y la materializacion a riesgo de vida de las politicas del partido.
					
					La conferencia continua.

articles.title: CCACU denuncia represion anti-Chongryon de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
CCACU denuncia represion anti-Chongryon de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Coreano de Ayuda a Compatriotas en Ultramar hizo publica el dia 25 una declaracion para denunciar la represion politica de los reaccionarios japoneses contra la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y los compatriotas radicados en Japon. 
					A la madrugada del dia 19, las autoridades japonesas movilizaron a los gangsteres de la direccion de pesquisa policiaca conjunta de la prefectura de Kyoto y los departamentos de Kanagawa, Yamaguchi y Shimane para registrar por la fuerza los domicilios de los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los coreanos en el pais isla y las companias y las agencias de viaje operadas por ellos bajo el pretexto de la violacion de la "ley de canje de divisas", comienza la nota y prosigue:
					
					El mismo dia, esos gangsteres irrumpieron por sorpresa en el domicilio del presidente de la sucursal de la Chongryon en Shibuse de la metropoli de Tokio.
					
					Bajo el pretexto arriba referido, le indagaron cosas enajenadas del Presidium del CC de la Chongryon y le incautaron documentos de la compania, ya que no pudieron encontrar ninguna evidencia.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, ellos registraron los domicilios y las companias del presidente y el jefe del departamento internacional de la Asociacion de Futbol de Coreanos Residentes en Japon. El registro duro 2 dias so pretexto de que esos funcionarios estan involucrados en la violacion de la "ley de canje de divisas", cometida por la compania de un japones llamada "Emu Creat´s".
					
					Esos hechos devienen otra grave provocacion contra la Chongryon y los compatriotas en Japon y un intolerable desafio y crimen contra la RPDC y la Chongryon.
					
					La investigacion violenta de los reaccionarios japoneses parte del objetivo de restar el prestigio y la autoridad de la RPDC y la Chongryon en la arena internacional al describir a esta ultima como entidad ilegal y criminal.
					
					Al inculcar asi en toda la extension geografica japonesa el ambiente anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon, quieren impedir las actividades justas de la Chongryon y los compatriotas en Japon y buscar el pretexto de la represion total contra la misma organizacion.
					
					La Chongryon es una parte valiosa de la RPDC y los compatriotas residentes en el pais isla son parientes consanguineos y familiares de nuestra patria y nuestro pueblo. 
					
					La RPDC mantiene la invariable posicion y voluntad de hacer frente rotundo a cualquier hostigamiento o represion a la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en el pais isla considerandolo como grave atentado contra su soberania. 
					
					Si las autoridades japonesas recrudecen la represion a la Chongryon, digna entidad de ciudadanos de la Corea del Juche en ultramar, desoyendo nuestras reiteradas advertencias, se redoblara la enemistad contra Japon de todos nuestros uniformados y habitantes y recaeran sobre ellas todas las consecuencias.
